docs.snippet: Yasmani Tomas, a 24-year-old outfielder who defected from Cuba last summer, has signed a six-year contract with the Arizona Diamondbacks, according to multiple reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yasmani Tomas, a 24-year-old outfielder who defected from Cuba last summer, has signed a six-year contract with the Arizona Diamondbacks, according to multiple reports.
docs.abstract: Arizona Diamondbacks sign six-year deal with outfielder Yasmani Tomas, who defected from Cuba in summer 2014; other MLB news noted.

headline.main: Cuban Defector Yasmani Tomas Signs With Arizona Diamondbacks

docs.snippet: Over the last two months, burglars have taken computers, cameras and money, but have left valuable religious items, at the churches of various denominations in the southwest part of the borough....
docs.lead_paragraph: Over the last two months, burglars have taken computers, cameras and money, but have left valuable religious items, at the churches of various denominations in the southwest part of the borough.
docs.abstract: Eleven churches in southwestern Brooklyn have been burglarized over two months, with thieves taking computers, cameras and money but leaving valuable religious items; police say they believe same person or persons is behind break-in.

headline.main: 11 Brooklyn Churches Hit in a String of Burglaries
headline.print_headline: 11 Brooklyn Churches Hit in a String of Burglaries

docs.snippet: Jose Miguel Ramirez went hunting for iguanas on a melon farm, and paid for it with his life. The 19-year-old's body was dumped by a stream near the property line, a bullet hole above his left eye....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jose Miguel Ramirez went hunting for iguanas on a melon farm, and paid for it with his life. The 19-year-old's body was dumped by a stream near the property line, a bullet hole above his left eye.
